channel.title: RainbowScape 317 Delta
channel.description:
We are starting a 317 Clean delta server but we are going ot to a stable pk, PvM and skilling server.
Our Website:
[img]https://imageshack.com/a/img538/456/rmA7tS.gif[/img]
What do we need ? -Client side coders 1/2 -Server side coders 2/2 -Modeller 0/4 -Hoster 0/1
WE NEED A HOSTER REALLY BAD!
UPDATELOG: [code] ================================================================= DATE | Name | Update and more info about the update. | DD/MM/YYYY | | | =================================================================
UPDATES COMING SOON!! [/code]
If you are interested add me on skype we'll talk there. Skypename: Supercrafter4

item.title: RainbowScape 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:7, topic:546790”]Project Rainbow was fun, I don’t know where you are getting that information from. Myself and several others had added content to that server when it was up and running and we all enjoyed it. Sure, it had several bad sectors and it wasn’t anywhere where it could be but don’t disrespect something good from the past.

I’m interested to know how you plan to to stabilize Delta and what other plans you have as far as internal work ( not in game content )[/quote] <3

On-topic, don’t use the source, there are far superior options.

Read full topic

Limits:

Can you add a barf bag feature?

item.title: RainbowScape 317 Delta
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Project Rainbow was fun, I don’t know where you are getting that information from. Myself and several others had added content to that server when it was up and running and we all enjoyed it. Sure, it had several bad sectors and it wasn’t anywhere where it could be but don’t disrespect something good from the past.

I’m interested to know how you plan to to stabilize Delta and what other plans you have as far as internal work ( not in game content )

Read full topic
